statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.InfoNoticeName , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.BGInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND AA.InfoNoticeName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.InfoNoticeName , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.BGInfoNotice AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BGInfoNotice ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, InfoNoticeName, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #InfoNoticeName#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BGInfoNotice SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, InfoNoticeName = #InfoNoticeName# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.BGInfoNoticeItem WHERE InfoNoticeID = #ID#; DELETE FROM dbo.BGInfoNotice WHERE ID = #ID#;
